original_title: Nomad: In the Footsteps of Bruce Chatwin
overview: When Bruce Chatwin was dying of AIDS, his friend Werner Herzog made a final visit. As a parting gift, Chatwin gave him his rucksack.  Thirty years later, Herzog sets out on his own journey, inspired by Chatwinâ€™s passion for the nomadic life, uncovering stories of lost tribes, wanderers and dreamers.
tagline: The world reveals itself to those who travel on foot
title: Nomad: In the Footsteps of Bruce Chatwin
